articles.title: Movements at Milan. La Repubblica: "Mateta taken. Maignan signs and goodbye Elliot"
articles.summary: Yesterday was the most important day of the last month for Milan.

articles.title: Serie A: dates, times and television assignments of the 25th and 26th matchdays
articles.summary: The Lega Serie A has announced the dates, times and television assignments of the championship matches on the 25th and 26th matchdays. Milan will be busy on Friday 13 February at 8pm.

articles.title: Milan-Como, the recovery date is official: here's when it will be played
articles.summary: The recovery date of Milan-Como is official.

articles.title: Moretto: "The name Tare is focusing on is that of Disasi"
articles.summary: Constant updates on the central defender front regarding the last, very hot, hours of the Rossoneri transfer market.

articles.title: LIVE MN - Milan transfer market: done for Cissè. Mike renews, decisive day for Mateta
Commissions, salary and formula, everything is ready for Mateta at Milan: the final approval from Palace is awaited
articles.summary: During the usual appointment with the video update on his YouTube channel, Fabrizio Romano took stock of Milan's incoming transfer market, talking about both the Mateta issue and the central defender.

articles.title: FOCUS MN - Power and sacrifice at the service of the game: Mateta is the prototype of an "allegriano" attacker
articles.summary: In an AC Milan looking for a "real" center forward, Jean-Philippe Mateta emerges as a congenial profile: the Crystal Palace born in 1997 combines physicality, sense of goal and tactical characteristics that fit perfectly with this...

articles.title: Done for Alphadjo Cissè: he will remain at Catanzaro until the end of the season
articles.summary: AC Milan secures the 2006-born talent Alphadjo Cissè, one of the most interesting and promising players in the entire Italian scene: and done! The Rossoneri club accelerated yesterday, entering the ...

articles.title: Ceccarini on the Mateta deal: "Milan hopes to bring forward the operation by raising the investment to 35 million"
articles.summary: During the usual appointment with his editorial for TMW, the transfer market expert Niccolò Ceccarini took stock of the various Italian teams, also focusing on Milan, ready to pull off that blow that doesn't seem to ...

articles.title: MN - Galliani specifies: "Milan is ahead of 18 teams, not behind Inter. Let's not forget that last year they finished eighth"
articles.summary: Adriano Galliani, at the presentation of the book "A corta muso" by Giuseppe Alberto Falci, on Allegri and the current situation of Milan. These are the words of the former Rossoneri CEO taken up by the MilanNews correspondent.

articles.title: Milan, not just Disasi: Sergio Ramos is a suggestion for the defence
articles.summary: In addition to the possible arrival of Jean-Philippe Mateta, in these last, excited 48 hours of the transfer market, Milan will also try to make a new central defender available to Massimiliano Allegri, so as to complete the ...

articles.title: Disasi-West Ham on stand-by: the player awaits a move from Milan
articles.summary: During the usual appointment with the video update on his YouTube channel, Fabrizio Romano took stock of Milan's incoming transfer market, talking about both the Mateta issue and the central defender.

articles.title: Ravezzani: "Mateta Furlani's operation. If that were the case, Tare's influence would be irrelevant"
articles.summary: Speaking on his social profiles, director Fabio Ravezzani spoke about the Jean-Philippe Mateta operation, which is close to its conclusion, going into detail by talking about who carried it out in the latest ones, and ...

articles.title: MN - Galliani: "If Allegri hadn't been there this year, Milan would have points less and not more"
articles.summary: Adriano Galliani, at the presentation of the book "A corta muso" by Giuseppe Alberto Falci, on Allegri and the current situation of Milan. These are the words of the former Rossoneri CEO taken up by the MilanNews correspondent.

articles.title: Nkunku-Roma: cold track at the moment, Gasperini's priorities are different
articles.summary: With the arrival, which seems imminent, of Jean-Philippe Mateta, Milan are trying to place Christopher Nkunku elsewhere, so as to make room for the Crystal Palace giant in the squad.

articles.title: Today is M-Day: Maignan will renew with Milan until 2031
articles.summary: After months of negotiations, dialogues and relaunches, Mike Maignan is ready to extend (for life) his relationship with Milan until 30 June 2031.

articles.title: Comvest enters, Elliot exits. CorSera: "Milan is always more than Cardinale"
articles.summary: Yesterday the official announcement of the refinancing by RedBird arrived, which officially bid farewell to Elliot after several years of its arrival.

articles.title: Milan, Doctor Mazzoni at the ADISE conference: "Management and prevention are fundamental to enhance the footballer"
articles.summary: In the context of the Milanese events dedicated to the transfer market, the ADISE conference entitled "Management of the footballer as a market asset: performance, prevention and sporting sustainability" was held, an appointment ...

articles.title: Renewal done. La Gazzetta: "Maignan yes, signing today. The agreement will last until 2031"
articles.summary: Until a few months ago this scenario was pure utopia, but today it will become reality.

articles.title: Milan, verbal agreement with Verona for Cissè: the details
articles.summary: In parallel to the discussion linked to Jean-Philippe Mateta, Milan has also worked in the last few hours for the Hellas Verona class of 2006, currently on loan at Catanzaro, Alphadio Cissè.
